CDCPLACES 1.1.5
  • Reference

Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs.

Source: R/get_places.R
get_places.Rd

Use this function to access CDC PLACES API data. Measures are sourced from the Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System and the American Community Survey ACS.

Usage

get_places(
  geo = "county",
  state = NULL,
  measure = NULL,
  release = "2023",
  geometry = FALSE
)

Arguments

geo

The level of desired geography. Currently supports 'county' and 'census'.

state

Specify the state of the desired data using the two letter abbreviation. Supports multiple states if desired.

measure

Specify the measures of the data pull. Supports multiple states if desired. For a full list of available measures, see the function 'get_dictionary'.

release

Specify the year of release for the PLACES data set. Currently supports years 2020-2023.

geometry

if FALSE (the default), return a regular data frame of PLACES data. If TRUE, uses the tigris package to return an sf data frame with simple feature geometry in the 'geometry' column.

Value

A tibble that contains observations for each measure (adjusted and unadjusted prevalence) and geographic level.

Examples

get_places(geo = "county", state = "MI", measure = "SLEEP", release = "2023")
#> # A tibble: 166 × 21
#>    year  stateabbr statedesc locationname datasource category            measure
#>    <chr> <chr>     <chr>     <chr>        <chr>      <chr>               <chr>  
#>  1 2020  MI        Michigan  Calhoun      BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  2 2020  MI        Michigan  Allegan      BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  3 2020  MI        Michigan  Barry        BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  4 2020  MI        Michigan  Cheboygan    BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  5 2020  MI        Michigan  Huron        BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  6 2020  MI        Michigan  Bay          BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  7 2020  MI        Michigan  Branch       BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  8 2020  MI        Michigan  Hillsdale    BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#>  9 2020  MI        Michigan  Alger        BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#> 10 2020  MI        Michigan  Houghton     BRFSS      Health Risk Behavi… Sleepi…
#> # ℹ 156 more rows
#> # ℹ 14 more variables: data_value_unit <chr>, data_value_type <chr>,
#> #   data_value <dbl>, low_confidence_limit <dbl>, high_confidence_limit <dbl>,
#> #   totalpopulation <chr>, locationid <chr>, categoryid <chr>, measureid <chr>,
#> #   datavaluetypeid <chr>, short_question_text <chr>, type <chr>, lon <dbl>,
#> #   lat <dbl>
get_places(geo = "county", state = c("MI", "OH"),
measure = c("SLEEP", "ACCESS2"), release = "2023")
#> # A tibble: 684 × 21
#>    year  stateabbr statedesc locationname datasource category            measure
